title: Fraction Explanation
text: Any whole number can be wrriten as a fraction as itself over $$1$$. This is equivalent to dividing the whole number by $$1$$, thus returning its original value.
speech: Any whole number can be wrriten as a fraction as itself over  1 . This is equivalent to dividing the whole number by  1, , thus returning its original value.

. This is equivalent to dividing the whole number by   1,

title: Fraction Explanation
text: $$3$$ can be written as a fraction in the form $$\frac{3}{1}$$.
speech: , 3  can be written as a fraction in the form  3 over 1 .

title: Multiplication
text: If $$\frac{3}{1}$$ is multiplied by $$1$$ it would still hold its value. $$\frac{3}{3}$$ can also be used to represent a value of $$1$$.
speech: If  3 over 1,  is multiplied by  1  it would still hold its value.  3 thirds  can also be used to represent a value of  1 .
